document_data.name: Fimmel Orelson
document_data.mainbody: '''Fimmel Orelson''' was the ruler of the [[frost giant]]s living near the [[Silver Marches]] in [[1484 DR]].
document_data.History: [[Gromph Baenre]] commented that Fimmel would be easily tricked by the fake frost giant brothers of [[Thrym]] that he and [[Saribel Xorlarrin]] had altered.
